clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Prostate is hyperechoic; volume approximately 34.15 cc.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 27.74 bpm.
Right kidney demonstrates enlarged, no hydronephrosis.
Common bile duct measures 19.68 mm, within normal limits.
